projectGridLines.title: Recruitment and Hiring
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Our Flagship product, where we aim to address the concerns of hiring

managers, recruiters and candidates and improve quality of hire, reduce time to

hire and reduce cost to hire, bringing out 10x improvements. Some of the projects

will be on AI Resume Builder, Blockchain based candidate referrals where there

are incentives for candidates to share relevant resumes, Recruiter AI Assistant and

more.. These are cutting edge features and requires good programming

knowledge... decent AI knowledge and further AI knowledge will be picked up on

the go

Skill sets: GenAI, software engineering, programming knowledge

Traits expectation: Even if candidate is new to ML/AI, should have good

programming experience

Expected learning: ML/AI, Gen AI, software development

Specific courses required for project execution: deeplearning.ai, python, strong

programming concepts

projectGridLines.title: Lead Generation
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Our Flagship product, where we aim to improve the sales conversion

by 3x-5x. In one shot user can 1000s of relevant profiles from linkedin and we fetch

their contact info and then AI will help in nurturing of the lead until conversion..

Here are some the projects associated with this product:

- Ability to add Leads from sources apart from Linkedin

- CRM AI agent

- Generating personalized messages (LLM based)

- Look up at the internet and summarise about company, Lead etc and

generate appropriate message

- Generate Market Insights and Analysis

- Lead AI analysis

- Different campaigns .. what went well, what changes are required... etc

using AI


- Picking up trends from Internet and then qualifying them for Leads

and several more

Skill sets: GenAI, software engineering, programming knowledge

Traits expectation: Even if candidate is new to ML/AI, should have good

programming experience, quick learner

Expected learning: ML/AI, Gen AI, software development

Specific courses required for project execution: deeplearning.ai, python, strong

programming concepts

projectGridLines.title: Healthcare Management and AI based projects
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Here, we want to build a solution that addresses the task management

of the doctor's team in hospital... Today, Main consultant doctor manages a team

of doctors, nurses and lab technicians and any operations/ other tasks is

co-ordinated manually among these actors.. We want to build an application, which

eases this work using AI... Likewise, for polyclinics we want to address the issue

of patient retention/ nurturing via AI.

Also, we take up AI based projects from other firms (services). For ex: Increasing

the patient base of GlobalGleneagles hospitals using AI.. Here AI will help in

patient nurturing / retention

Skill sets: GenAI, ML, software engineering Traits expectation: Even if candidate is new to ML/AI, should have good

programming experience, quick learner

Expected learning:ML/AI, Gen AI, software development, healthcare domain

knwoledge
